biocontainers.name: speaq
biocontainers.summary: The speaq package is meant to make Nuclear Magnetic Resonance spectroscopy (NMR spectroscopy) data analysis as easy as possible by only requiring a small set of functions to perform an entire analysis

biotools.summary: A framework for analyzing automatically raw 1D NMR spectra data. It is also compatible with other NMR frameworks or complementary LC-MS workflows.

bioschemas.name: speaq
bioschemas.summary: A framework for analyzing automatically raw 1D NMR spectra data. It is also compatible with other NMR frameworks or complementary LC-MS workflows.
